channel.title: Avalanche Studios Will Show ‘Something’ Real Soon
channel.description:
Will it be something about Mad Max and/or Just Cause 3?
[url='https://www.dsogaming.com/news/avalanche-studios-will-show-something-real-soon/']https://www.dsogaming.com/news/avalanche-studios-will-show-something-real-soon/[/url]

item.title: Avalanche Studios Will Show ‘Something’ Real Soon
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
I just hope JC3 has some decent voice acting and a better story line, if that’s what it is. I want mad max though, it looks legitimately fun.

Read full topic
